channel.title: A few 'Newby' questions
channel.description:
Question one: How can I make a "donator" rank? then that leads to how do I make it to where some items only donators can wear.
Removing shops: how do I do this, I wanna remove two shops...how do I know which one is which, ect. what files?
May add one later.

item.title: A few 'Newby' questions
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

Im sorry i can’t help you with the donator rank. But i can help you with the shop.
Like Liquid Magic sayd, delete the shop in shop.cfg. But then, if you press Trade or Talk, you still see the screen, with nothing in the shop. If u don’t want that too, then delete the wanneshop of that NPC ID. The wanneshop must be the shop ID you deleted. Like, if u have deleted the shop ID 10 in shops.cfg, search in client.java for wanneshop = 10 or wanneshop == 10 and delete the code and the 2 rows above it.

Read full topic

item.title: A few 'Newby' questions
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

O.O, don’t know where shops are located?

Go to your “Config” folder and click “shops.cfg”

Clear the whole folder, if you want to make some, I’m guessing you’ll get fucked with the spacing, then you’ll null out, I suggest keeping some backups for copy & paste.

Read full topic
